txt.en: Collect Frostulf's tankard
Collect Wildwood brigand boots ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collected goblin badge of rank
Collect mottled spider mandibles ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Hunward has asked you to bring him Wildwood brigand boots and Frostulf's tankard.\n\nFrostulf Splitknuckle can be challenged outside the western gate of Cotfast in the Wildwood.

'I will need mandibles from spiders such as those found in Angmar and other dangerous places. I will also need bubbling droplets from the brimstone-leeches which creep through the swamp of Malenhad in Angmar.'
Hunward is at Trader's Wharf in the Wildwood.
'DNT - Blah!'
Spiders can found in Angmar and other dangerous places. Brimstone-leeches can be found in Malenhad in Angmar.\n\nHunward asked you to bring him mottled spider-mandibles and bubbling droplets.

'Nice work, [placeholder]! You showed Frostulf a thing or two, I expect! But these next materials will be more difficult to obtain, for you will need to go further afield for them.\n\n'I will need mandibles from spiders such as those found in Angmar and other dangerous places. I will also need bubbling droplets from the brimstone-leeches which creep through the swamp of Malenhad in Angmar.'
Hunward is at Trader's Wharf in the Wildwood.
'DNT - Blah!'
DNT - Blah!
Collected mottled spider mandibles ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'You did it! These materials are disgusting, but they are necessary. The droplets will season the leather of the boots you brought me, and the toughened strips will provide excellent defence. But you are not finished yet, and this next task will prove you are a Brawler most worthy!\n\n'I require a horn from the Gorthorog Tarlûg, who resides in Carn Dûm. I also need a badge of rank from the goblins of Urugarth. Prove that you can stand against opponents both large and small, and fear neither!'
Deliver the last batch of materials to Hunward at Trader's Wharf
Collected bubbling droplets ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'A true Brawler knows the importance of a strong defence! Value might and vitality, but value too your appearance while you fight, for anything can be turned to your advantage mid-brawl: even the flashing glint of jewellery might distract your foe at an inopportune moment!

'I can fashion you suitable jewellery for this purpose, but I will need a number of materials from you: not only for the crafting, but also to prove that you are deserving of it! It is a tradition among Brawlers, my friend, and I would not wish to break it! It is our foes who will break, after all!

'A Dourhand brigand named Frostulf Splitknuckle fancies himself a Brawler, and he has issued an open challenge to folk in the Wildwood: he claims he will defeat any opponent in single combat, and without spilling a drop of his beer! Find him outside the western gate of Cotfast and answer his challenge. Bring me his tankard and prove you are a worthy Brawler, [placeholder].

'So too will I require the boots of brigands here in the Wildwood. Only the leather of such boots will serve, so bring them to me without complaint.'

'I am glad you have returned, [placeholder], for it means that you have successfully dispatched Raillug. I see too that you bring the Tarkrîp-boots I need.\n\n'While I make use of these items, you should set out to collect the next set of components. I will need mandibles from spiders such as those found in Angmar and other dangerous places. I will also need bubbling droplets from the brimstone-leeches which creep through the swamp of Malenhad in Angmar.'
'DNT - Blah!'
'You do not have the components for which I asked, [placeholder].'
Hunward is at Trader's Wharf in the Wildwood.

'Well done, [placeholder]. Only one set of components remains, and acquiring these will be your greatest challenge.\n\n'I need you to obtain one of the blood-stained tally-sticks that the fearsome Orcs Gríshakrum, Kughûrz, and Dafrim use to record their kills. As well, I need you to acquire an Insignia of Battle from the uruks Sorkrank and Burzfîl. All of them may be found in Urugarth.'

'Most impressive, my brawling friend! You are truly deserving of the fine piece of jewellery I have crafted for you. May it protect you no matter the number or ferocity of the opponents you face!

'Why did I need you to gather such assorted materials? Ah, I am making myself a new pair of boots. Never underestimate a good pair of boots!

'Enjoy the jewellery, my brawling friend, as I will enjoy the boots your labour has made possible.'
'You do not have the components I need, [placeholder]?'
Collect Raillug's frozen hide
'I knew you would return, [placeholder], and with the final components I need!\n\n'I give to you a piece of equipment worthy of your skills, and with it my overwhelming respect.'
Collected brimstone-tinged Tarkrîp-boots ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collected ashen Gorthorog-horn
'You do not have the components for which I asked, [placeholder].'
Collected mottled spider-mandibles ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collected bubbling droplets ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect goblin badge of rank
Collected blood-stained tally-stick

'A Dourhand brigand named Frostulf Splitknuckle fancies himself a Brawler, and he has issued an open challenge to folk in the Wildwood: he claims he will defeat any opponent in single combat, and without spilling a drop of his beer! Find him outside the western gate of Cotfast and answer his challenge. Bring me his tankard and prove you are a worthy Brawler, [placeholder].\n\n'So too will I require the boots of brigands here in the Wildwood.'
Collected Insignia of Battle
Hunward at Trader's Wharf in the Wildwood has agreed to fashion you some jewellery to enhance your brawling potential.
Collected Frostulf's tankard
Collect Insignia of Battle
Collected Wildwood brigand boots ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Bring last set of components to Gwesgylliel
Collect blood-stained tally-stick
Collect Insignia of Battle
Tarlûg can be found at Carn Dûm in Angmar. Goblins can be found at Urugarth in Angmar.\n\nHunward asked you to bring him an ashen Gorthorog-horn and a goblin-badge of rank.

'You're missing something.'

'I now require a horn from the Gorthorog Tarlûg, who resides in Carn Dûm. I also need a badge of rank from the goblins of Urugarth. Prove that you can stand against opponents both large and small, and fear neither!'

'Most impressive, my brawling friend! You are truly deserving of the fine piece of jewellery I have crafted for you. May it protect you no matter the number or ferocity of the opponents you face!

'Why did I need you to gather such assorted materials? Ah, I am making myself a new pair of boots. Never underestimate a good pair of boots! I suppose you hobbits wouldn't know about that, would you?

'Enjoy the jewellery, my brawling friend, as I will enjoy the boots your labour has made possible.'

'Most impressive, my brawling friend! You are truly deserving of the fine piece of jewellery I have crafted for you. May it protect you no matter the number or ferocity of the opponents you face!

'Why did I need you to gather such assorted materials? Ah, I am making myself a new pair of boots. Never underestimate a good pair of boots! Do your folk wear boots?

'Enjoy the jewellery, my brawling friend, as I will enjoy the boots your labour has made possible.'
Deliver the second batch of materials to Hunward at Trader's Wharf

Raillug can be found in the north-western corner of the Misty Mountains. Tarkrîp goblins can be found among the Orc-camps of Malenhad in Angmar.\n\nGwesgylliel asked you to bring her Raillug's frozen hide and brimstone-tinged Tarkrîp-boots.
Gwesgylliel is at Lin Giliath in Meluinen, in the North Downs.\n\nGwesgylliel is waiting for you to return with the first set of components for which she asked.
Spiders can found in Angmar and other dangerous places. Brimstone-leeches can be found in Malenhad in Angmar.\n\nGwesgylliel asked you to bring her mottled spider-mandibles and bubbling droplets.
Gwesgylliel is at Lin Giliath in Meluinen, in the North Downs.\n\nGwesgylliel is waiting for you to return with the second set of components she needs.
Gríshakrum, Kughûrz, Dafrim, Sorkrank, and Burzfîl may all be found in Urugarth in Angmar.\n\nGwesgylliel asked you to return with a blood-stained tally-stick and an Insignia of Battle.
Gwesgylliel is at Lin Giliath in Meluinen, in the North Downs.\n\nGwesgylliel is waiting for you to return with the last set of components she needs.
'You are missing something.'
Collect bubbling droplets ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'The worm Raillug may be found in the north-eastern corner of the Misty Mountains, while you may find the Tarkrîp goblins among the Orc-camps of Malenhad in Angmar.'
Collect ashen Gorthorog-horn
'You may find the spiders I seek in Angmar and other dangerous lands. Brimstone-leeches can only be found in Malenhad in Angmar.'
'You may find all of the Orcs and uruks that I named in Urugarth.'
Deliver the first batch of materials to Hunward at Trader's Wharf
'Who challenges me to a brawl? Who would dare?'
